name: Katawan
description:
A short horror game, made in 48 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020! Stranded in a strange base, you must try to escape. But be careful with who you encounter - you won't know if they are friend or foe.

Take care not to kill any innocents!

Special thanks to SideUpDown for helping with the level assets: https://sideupdown.itch.io/

Made in the Unreal engine.

CONTROLS:

A and D or Left Stick to move

Shift, Right Trigger, or Right Click to aim

Space, A Button or Left Click to shoot, or interact with objects when not aiming
